channel.title: Change CFG files directory
channel.description:
Hi there. How to "give" to RUN.BAT information about where are CFG files, cause I must to do this(to transfer CFG files from Config folder to other folder , where is RUN.BAT and other files) because I am trying to host my source on VDS(LINUX) but RUN.SH(ON LINUX) cannot find CFG files cause these files are in Config folder...PLease help me with it!
p.s. SORRY FOR MY BAD ENGLISH. Do not offer to get a new one source, cause I 've had hard working on this server.
